relation: One thing with campus safety is the main gate. Anybody can come through they don't care.
This is all you see on campus. Very Historical.
Some of the activities aren't advertised to the mass student body like they should.
its not worth the money they are asking for.
The Dorm activities that are posted.
Very Repetitive its sickening. Not that much variety. typical HBCU food.
Dorm Life is What you make it to Be....
Don't let the school fool you. Work hard for the money.
It wasn't my first choice, But I came here to get my first college experience away from home. It was worth it I learned plenty from Virginia Union University.

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Brittani from Richmond, VA 03/15/2012 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 3 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 29 Categories Comments Campus Safety is surounded by the police-training academy of richmond police training academy. it feels very safe while you are on the campus. Greek Life alpha kappa mu honor society, alpha phi omega. Clubs and Activities alpha kappa mu honor society, alpha phi omega, carver promise, chapel choir, community of scholars, concert choir, greek letter organizations, yearbook, student newspaper, university players and also central intercollegiate athletic association (ciaa), basketball, cross- country, football, golf, softball, tennis, track & field, volleyball Great for these types of students for students who want to get that one on one with their professor. who wants to be in a small class room setting.
